Text: Mirrormaster, you are the best...you upload rare and classic stuff along with the usual popular,recognizable comics....this is definitely a collectible item
thanks mm. you do come up with total surprises. very nice ones at that. :-)

Hey MM, great upload. Just wondering if you have another true serial killer graphic novel called "My Friend Dahmer" by Derf Backderf . It's about Jeffrey Dahmer in high school, from a friend who became a comic artist.
Appreciate the out-of-the-way stuff you expose us to, MM. Thanks very much!
